page.title: 08ADDERLEY CHURCH FETE
page.content: The Church Fete takes place every year. They have a fancy dress for children from our school. Last year a helicopter landed from Tern Hill; Adderley Judo Club did a display and there was a pig being roasted on a spit for a dance that night. This year the Rector has got the local Disc Jockey to play 60's music at night time for the mums and dads to dance to. During the day there are races going on with games and various stalls. You can have a ride on a pony and trap to the church and back. All the money goes to the church. In Autumn we have a Harvest Auction after the service where they sell the vegetables and fruit that have been given to the church. It is a very popular occasion.
